site_name: 86 Tolworth Park RoadTolworthSurbitonKT6 7RH

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: KEYACH Name: Tolworth Key Area of Change
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been provided in regard to Condition 3 (Materials), of Planning Permission 18/16634/FUL, in respect of the details of materials for all external windows (including their manufacturer's specification, colour and texture). The application therefore fails to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

Insufficient information has been provided in regard to Condition 5 (Boundary Treatment), of Planning Permission 18/16634/FUL, in respect of the proposed front boundary treatment to be provided. The application therefore fails to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

The details submitted pursuant to Condition 15 (Landscaping) of Planning Permission 18/16634/FUL, fail to demonstrate a hard and soft landscaping scheme, including where applicable, details of measures to protect and retain existing trees. The application therefore does not comply with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

Insufficient information has been provided in regard to Condition 17 (Architectural Details). Of Planning Permission 18/16634/FUL, Information for windows, doors, overhangs, rainwater goods are required at scale 1:10. The application therefore fails to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
description: Details required by Conditions 3 (Materials), 4 (Refuse Storage),5 (Boundary Treatment), 6 (Cycle Parking), 9 (Sustainable Drainage System),10 (Construction Management Plan), 15 (Landscaping Scheme) and 17(Architectural Details), of Planning Permission 18/16634/FUL   (Demolition of existing bungalow and erection of 2 x semi-detached 2 bed houses with associated access onto Tolworth Park Road.)
